ERODE

Erode Sengunthar Engineering College: Pongal celebrations,

9.30 a.m.; knowledge-sharing session by principal L. Boopathi,

4.10 p.m.

SALEM

Sri Prasanna Varadaraja Perumal Devasthanam: Margazhi Tiruppavai Upanyasa Mahotsavam, B.M. Sathya Ram Acharya delivers upanyasam, Vasantha mandapam, Chinnakadai street, 6.45 a.m.

Tiruvembavai Peruvizha Kazhagam Trust: Tiruvembavai peruvizha, Tiruvembavai parayanam, Arulmigu Sugavaneswara Swamy Temple, 5.15 a.m.

Margazhi Peruvizha Committee: Margazhi festival, Nanjil Sampath speaks on ‘Tamizh yengal uyarvukku vaan,’ 7 p.m.

Infant Jesus Cathedral, Arisipalayam: Pangu Peruvizha, Pongal festival, tiruppali, S. Victor Cruz, presides, 11 a.m.; jabamalai and Navanaal, tiruppali, A. Deva presides, 6 p.m.

National Child Labour Project: SMILE, integrated child protection programme, training for Nadel teachers of Panamarathupatti and Veerapandi blocks, Blood Resource Centre premises, Veerapandi,

9.30 a.m.

Periyar University: Pongal celebrations, folk festival, exhibition and folk arts performance by students, C. Swaminathan, Vice-Chancellor, presides, 9.30 a.m.

North Eastern Handicrafts and Handlooms Development Corporation Limited: North East crafts bazaar, Deiveegam Marriage hall, 10 a.m. to 9 p.m.

National Book Trust and New Century Book House: National Book Festival books exhibition, Bose Maidan, 9.30 a.m. and 9.30 p.m.

Cooptex: Handloom Pongal celebrations, Thangam Pattu Maligai,, 10 a.m.; New Year and Pongal handloom textiles exhibition, Bose Maidan, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Indian Oil Corporation Limited and The Hindu: Sales promotion campaign, T. Palanikumar, CDRSM, IOCL, Salem divisional office, chief guest, Arun Kumar, Deputy Manager, participates, Sri Ranganathar and Company, Narasothipatti, 9.30 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Pongal Festival handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.
